metadata.title: CVE-2023-52354 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
chasquid before 1.13 allows SMTP smuggling because LF-terminated lines areaccepted.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52354` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chasquid - 1.13-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chasquid package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13-1').
